sentence.Network_en: Do you think the voters will be convinced by the President's fireside address to the nation?
sentence.Network_cn: 你认为选民们会相信总统对国民的炉边演说 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: Meantime the Rat, warm and comfortable, dozed by his fireside.
sentence.Network_cn: 与此同时,感到温暖适意的老鼠, 正坐在火炉边打盹.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 炉_百度百科 ... ◎ 粤语： lou4 English ◎ 炉边[ fireside] ◎ 炉衬[ furnace liner;furnace lining].
She lay on a sofa by the fireside , looking perfectly happy with darlings about her ., 她斜靠在火炉边的沙发上 , 有心爱的孩子们在身边 , 她很是快活.
21世纪大学英语读写教程单词表(四) - 豆丁网 ... peacetime n. 和平时期 fireside n. 壁炉旁 chat n. 闲谈， 聊天.

list.abs: ...美国最需要它的时候。《胜利花园》(victory·Gardens)、《炉边闲聊》(fireside chats)以及《思考致富》等,都成了一个国家与大萧条 …
到任仅有几天，他又创立两项定例:一是所谓炉边闲话(FIRESIDE CHATS)，他对全国人民以和蔼可亲的语调，播送施政方针，勉励大 …
and he is you board and you fireside ., 他是你的饮食 , 也是你的火炉.
He sat by the fireside drinking his cocoa ., 他坐在炉边喝著他的可可亚.
在一个“炉边谈话”(fireside chat)广播中，罗斯福总统说他非常希望这个国家能置身于战争之外。他说：“我见过战争而且我痛恨战争”。
在与Android团队举行的“炉边会议”(fireside chat)上，开发人员总是有许多关于操作系统碎片的问题，但谷歌对很多问题都没有答案。

entry.def: If you sit by the fireside in a room, you sit near the fire.

example.tran: 在炉火旁度过的那些冬夜

means.word_mean: 1. an area near a fireplace (usually paved and extending out into a room);

sentences.sentence: "they sat on the hearth and warmed themselves before the fire"

means.word_mean: 2. home symbolized as a part of the fireplace;
